detectors.description:
RTC.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#148-160) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- totalEthInWei = totalEthInWei + msg.value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#149)
	- amount = msg.value * unitsOneEthCanBuy (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#150)
	- balances[fundsWallet] = balances[fundsWallet] - amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#153)
	- balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender] + amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#154)
detectors.markdown:
[RTC.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#L148-L160) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [totalEthInWei = totalEthInWei + msg.value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#L149)
	- [amount = msg.value * unitsOneEthCanBuy](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#L150)
	- [balances[fundsWallet] = balances[fundsWallet] - amount](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#L153)
	- [balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender] + amount](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RTC.sol#L154)
